articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: Hulkenberg set for Audi F1 switch after Haas departure revealed - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Nico Hulkenberg is set to join Audi in Formula 1, after his current Haas team revealed he is leaving the American-owned squad at the end of this season for Sauber.
articles.content:
The German had emerged as one of the key targets for Audi, which is gearing up with its current Sauber partner for its official F1 entry as a works team from 2026.

articles.title: Anglo American rejects BHP's $39 billion takeover bid to form mining juggernaut - CNBC
articles.description: Mining giant Anglo American on Friday rejected a takeover bid from rival BHP Group, saying the offer "significantly undervalues" the company and its future prospects.
